tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_indicator_funding CASCADE;
create view v_ni_indicator_funding AS select ic.activity_id as amp_activity_id, iv.value, iv.value_type, iv.value_date as value_date, ic.indicator_id as me_indicator_id from amp_indicator i join amp_indicator_connection ic ON i.indicator_id = ic.indicator_id and ic.sub_clazz='a' join amp_indicator_values iv ON ic.id = iv.ind_connect_id join amp_activity_version a ON ic.activity_id = a.amp_activity_id
